headline: Akamai Launches Cloud-Agnostic, Ready-to-Run Application Platform
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud company that powers and protects business online, today announced the Akamai App Platform, a ready-to-run solution that makes it easy to deploy, manage, and scale highly distributed applications.

raw.headline: Akamai Launches Cloud-Agnostic, Ready-to-Run Application Platform
raw.summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud company that powers and protects business online, today announced the Akamai App Platform, a ready-to-run solution that makes it easy to deploy, manage, and scale highly distributed applications.

headline: Akamai price target lowered to $115 from $120 at Baird
summary: Baird lowered the firm’s price target on Akamai (AKAM) to $115 from $120 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm said they reported in-line Q3 revenue excluding a one-time benefit and provided a weaker Q4 outlook driven principally by continued delivery headwinds. Security, though decelerating, and compute, continue to produce double-digit growth, which Baird expects to continue into 2025. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financ
